楒字的基本解释

楒
sī
〔相楒树〕即“相思树”，一种种子是红色的树。

楒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sī］
［《廣韻》息兹切，平之，心。］
(1)木名。即相思树。豆科，蔓生灌木。叶为羽状复叶，多椭圆形小叶。花呈蝶形，白色或带红色。豆科有些具有红色种子的树种，如红豆树等，也叫相思树。
(2)人名用字。明有朱祐楒。见《明史·枣阳王祐楒传》。

楒字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楒； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页539第07
【唐韻】息兹切【集韻】新兹切，?音思。【唐韻】相楒木也。【左思·吳都賦】楠榴之木，相思之樹。【李善註】相思，大樹也。材理堅邪，斫之有文，可作器。其實如珊瑚，歷年不變。東冶有之。　又【搜神記】有文梓木，生韓馮夫婦二冢之端，根交于下，枝錯于上，號相思樹。

楒字的源字形

字形对比：

楒字的起名意思

木名。即相思树。豆科，蔓生灌木。叶为羽状复叶，多椭圆形小叶。花呈蝶形，白色或带红色；常用于人名。

楒
Basic explanation of words
楒
sī
[Acacia tree] means "Acacia tree", a tree with red seeds.
楒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sī]
["Guangyun" Xiziqi, Pingzhi, Heart. ]
(1) Wooden name. That is the acacia tree. Leguminous, trailing shrub. The leaves are pinnately compound leaves with many oval leaflets. The flowers are butterfly-shaped, white or reddish. Some species of legumes with red seeds, such as red bean trees, are also called acacia trees.
(2) Use characters for names. There is Zhu Youyu in the Ming Dynasty. See "The History of the Ming Dynasty·The Biography of Zaoyang Wangyou Lian".
楒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　楒; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 539 Page 07
[Tang Yun] Xiziqie [Jiyun] Xinziqie,? Yinsi. [Tang Yun] Xiangmu also. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】The tree of phoebe lilac, the tree of acacia. [Li Shan's Note] Acacia, also a big tree. The material is strong and evil, and there is text in the book, and it can be used as a tool. In fact, like a coral, it has not changed over the years. Dongye has it.　 [Sou Shen Ji] There is Wen Zimu, born at the end of the second grave of Han Feng and his wife. The roots are on the bottom and the branches are on the wrong side. It is called Acacia.

Name meaning
Wooden name. That is the acacia tree. Leguminous, trailing shrub. The leaves are pinnately compound leaves with many oval leaflets. The flowers are butterfly-shaped, white or reddish; they are often used in names.
